DOC.criteria: 1 . Age great 18 2 . Elective cesarean section 3 . Term pregnancy 1 . Fever > 101F past 14 day 2 . Antibiotics past 14 day 3 . Suspected ongoing infection 4 . Poorly control gestational diabetes 5 . Allergic adhesive
